aboutParagraphs:
I’m Fiona, a third-year student at Northeastern University studying Computer Science and Graphic Design with a minor in Ethics. Last spring, I began my first co-op at Radial Analytics. As a designer and data scientist at Radial, I gained a passion for the ways effective utilization of data and design can improve the world around us. 
This semester, I'm studying abroad in Bangkok, Thailand at Mahidol University. When I'm not studying, I spend most of my time traveling, hiking, scuba diving, and eating lots of delicious Thai food.
aboutYaml.title: Sawasdee Kha!
aboutYaml.subtitle: (sah•wah•dee kha) - hello in Thai
